title: IKODI
description: IKodi is my personal blog, where I share my knowledge writing posts about different tools, technologies and concepts related to the world of web development. With comment system included!

title: KINGS LEAGUE INFOJOBS
description: API and website of the Kings League InfoJobs (for didactic purpuoses). Open-source, made along with @midudev's community. We implemented web scrapping, GitHub Actions and testing. I've colaborated in the UI and writing documentation.

title: PAULA'S GALLERY
description: Paula Bonavita is an artist, and here she shares her work, both writings and paintings.

title: QUICK PAPPER
description: An AI-powered application to generate blog drafts from just a title. You can summarize, extend or regenerate each slice of the blog, and then export it in HTML, Markdown or plain text.

title: ANIMATED WEATHER
description: Create a video of the weather status anywhere in the world. Customize music, colors, and then download it to share with others.

title: MINECRAFT CLONE
description: A fully functional Minecraft clone, based on the freeCodeCamp tutorial, using Three.js (a 2D/3D JavaScript library), React and TypeScript.

title: FULL STACK TODO
description: The typical To-Do application, but integrating both client and server sides, with users authentication and data persistence with MongoDB.

title: TIC TAC TOE
description: In this version of the well-known Tic-Tac-Toe, you can play versus the machine, store your points locally to play later, change players colors and some other funny features.

title: CONNECT FOUR
description: My version of the "Connect Four" game, implementing OOP with TypeScript and separating logic from view.

title: CRYPTO ASSETS
description: A simple dashboard to view your crypto address's transactions, with a minimalist design based on Material Design style guidelines.
